mute.success.title: ✅ Muted `{{username}}`
mute.role_invalid.title: ❌ Invalid Mute Role
mute.role_invalid.description:
Your mute role is either:

1. Not been set yet
2. Is not an actual role

To set a mute role use `/config set guild.mute.role <mute role id>`
error.invalid_duration.title: ❌ Invalid Duration
error.bot_missing_permission.title: ❌ I don't have the `{{permission}}` permission!
error.user_missing_permission.title: ❌ You don't have the `{{permission}}` permission!
